channel.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?
channel.description:
Ok, so my cousin is graduating this year from high school.
Her dad is indian.
When she graduates, the government gives the tribe, to give her (because of her dad being indian) 60,000 dollars, and pay for her college, JUST BECAUSE WE TOOK THEIR FUCKING LAND 200 SOME YEARS AGO? What the fuck? Our nation is shitty enough and in debt enough to have some mooching fat ass indians crying that we took their shit so long ago.
Anyone else agree?

item.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:4, topic:369210”][quote author=prison190 link=topic=465343.msg3402972#msg3402972 date=1290112962]

[/quote]its a general discussion, it won’t[quote author=Javafire link=topic=465343.msg3402971#msg3402971 date=1290112951]
Agreed x 10 hispanics are becoming the same way
[/quote]i HATE beaners and niggers so much, words can’t describe. i cant wait to gtfo out of america and go to canada…[/quote]

GO TO ANTARCTICA!

[quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=465343.msg3403370#msg3403370 date=1290129260]
Indian = from fucking india

NATIVE AMERICAN*****

Are all Americans this ignorant?
[/quote]Its because of how we where raised, in history when this country was first found “Christopher Columbus” thought he was in “India” thus calling the natives “Indians”. It’s more or less that we are raised calling them Indians then being ignorant.
[/quote]I’m from michigan and i remember my elementery teacher teaching us they’re called native americans not indians. so no, it’s not because they’re raised.[/quote]The way someones parents raise them can cause it as well, just because your teacher did it different doesn’t mean the hole nation did, I remember all of my teachers here in Florida calling them Indians, and not Native Americans.

rip4d:

Can’t a mod lock this already? Half of the shit on this thread is flame, and the other half is pointless arguments. I mean really, there isn’t any point to leave this open.

[quote=“m.dog311, post:70, topic:369210”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=465343.msg3403356#msg3403356 date=1290128629]

why does casey. even try to be right, he/she/it’s such a fuckin jackass.

Well let’s see, I’m an international law student(So I know laws, government, and policies) in nearly every country, I’m in an internship with the UN, and one of my closest friends is Native American. Yeah, I mean I am a jackass right?

You really are quiet ignorant, and even though Mdog is an idiot, that award is reserved solely for you.
[/quote] i highly doubt that, only proof you have is your fucking words.

Same with you and Chaos ;)[/quote]
eh, but others like krackkid know me, they’ve got my facebook ect… they could back em up if they needed to on facts.

gravenfire23:

lol infractions no body likes those and for another thing the hole thread is a big pile of racist shit

it is… but…

mooching fat ass indians crying
i HATE beaners and niggers so much
i HATE niggers
why does casey. even try to be right, he/she/it's such a fuckin jackass.
btw m.dog your a nerdy fuck, that will never get a girlfriend, go kill yourself.
i discriminate anyone who isn't white, or has a religion other than christian/atheist. i HATE niggers.

some examples im just sayin. these arent me, just some other various posters, look around and youll findem, unless they read this and deleted what they posted. OT:

item.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:61, topic:369210”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3403094#msg3403094 date=1290117154]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=465343.msg3403088#msg3403088 date=1290117041]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3402994#msg3402994 date=1290114049]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=465343.msg3402990#msg3402990 date=1290113956]

… to have some mooching fat ass indians crying that we took their shit so long ago.

Anyone else agree?
[/quote]That is why they get money, they’re still discriminated against.
[/quote]i discriminate anyone who isn’t white, or has a religion other than christian/atheist. i HATE niggers.
[/quote]Why.
[/quote]its just being raised differently. i was raised around mexicans, and than lived in the same small apartment as a black family who did hit me when they baby sat me sometimes. i now have a special hatred for them. its just me.

I grew up around Hispanic people (my sister is married to one) and African Americans (my mother is married to one from Morocco) and I don’t seem to agree. I have nothing agianst these people and I was raised to not have respect for these people. I am guessing at first impact of reading this you think that the mexicans are illegal and my step-dad is a nigger. Honestly they are both more nice than the normal person in this country and could probably both beat the living shit out of half the people you know.

It’s not the way you grow up, it’s when you grow up and move on with your life. Being a retard and stereotyping a whole race makes you look like an idiot and will end up on the negative side every time.

I find it funny because if this was a white person receiving this money for perhaps the same reason, you would of never made a post on this.[/quote]

Exactly if a white person was granted 60 Grand there wouldent even be a thread for this it would probably just be mentioned in some random persons off topic post the sad thing is that the goverment is still GIVING away free cash imo the american goverment is already in too deep and dosent need to give away 60 Grand when it could be used to purches wepons for on going wars ect witch is probably the reason why america is in the hole in the first place because they give away to much stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:48, topic:369210”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=465343.msg3403088#msg3403088 date=1290117041]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3402994#msg3402994 date=1290114049]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=465343.msg3402990#msg3402990 date=1290113956]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3402969#msg3402969 date=1290112878]
… to have some mooching fat ass indians crying that we took their shit so long ago.

Anyone else agree?
[/quote]That is why they get money, they’re still discriminated against.
[/quote]i discriminate anyone who isn’t white, or has a religion other than christian/atheist. i HATE niggers.
[/quote]Why.
[/quote]its just being raised differently. i was raised around mexicans, and than lived in the same small apartment as a black family who did hit me when they baby sat me sometimes. i now have a special hatred for them. its just me.[/quote]

I grew up around Hispanic people (my sister is married to one) and African Americans (my mother is married to one from Morocco) and I don’t seem to agree. I have nothing agianst these people and I was raised to not have respect for these people. I am guessing at first impact of reading this you think that the mexicans are illegal and my step-dad is a nigger. Honestly they are both more nice than the normal person in this country and could probably both beat the living shit out of half the people you know.

It’s not the way you grow up, it’s when you grow up and move on with your life. Being a retard and stereotyping a whole race makes you look like an idiot and will end up on the negative side every time.

I find it funny because if this was a white person receiving this money for perhaps the same reason, you would of never made a post on this.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this bull shit, or just me?

item.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Chaos, I used to have respect for you, but I think this just ends it all. I had a high-B adverage in school for only a year and a half. My first 2 and a half years of high school I had just-passing grades. Does this mean I do not deserve the governments grand for my college? I think so, as I am going in for something I love to do. You are being a very ignorant person to think that most black americans are racist. It is the skin-heads like you that give us white people a bad rep. If we stopped complaining about shit, and just accepted what we are given (aka, when you are handed lemons, make lemonaid), there would be no issues. I personally, in the very racist state, Mississippi, had a mix of black and white friends. How you ask? Because we showed respect for eachother, even if we had our differences, we showed respect. Respect for your follow man is how wars are won. Not letting him get shot because hes a different color of skin.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:7, topic:369210”]Seeing as the way our past leaders treated native Americans, yeah, they deserve it.

It’s not like many people get money, I believe only 1-5%(probably less) of Americans are natives, as well, she is probably getting some scholarship.(Take into consideration how many actually pursue education)

Right now my college is 100% paid for in Florida due to my grades, put that with a full ride for academic/sports and I’m getting money(About 100k). I don’t know where you live, but you’re probably not getting the full story.[/quote]
Which college?

@ OP: when did their longest back relatives come to America?

item.description:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:50, topic:369210”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3403094#msg3403094 date=1290117154]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=465343.msg3403088#msg3403088 date=1290117041]

Anyone else agree?

[/quote]i discriminate anyone who isn’t white, or has a religion other than christian/atheist. i HATE niggers.
[/quote]Why.
[/quote]its just being raised differently. i was raised around mexicans, and than lived in the same small apartment as a black family who did hit me when they baby sat me sometimes. i now have a special hatred for them. its just me.
[/quote]Oh, so due to perhaps a .00001 percentile of the population of blacks and mexicans having a slightly negative impact on your life personally determines your views on their race as a whole?[/quote]i lived around them my whole life, all of them except for a small percent were as racist towards me than, as i am to them now. i just recently left the 2 areas i lived in that i lived around them. like i said, its just the way i was raised. i’ve met decent mexicans before, wish i could say the same about blacks.

btw. theres a 37.4% chance that the statistic you gave me was made up.

@ m.dog… yea we both have soooo much to lie about. and no, and i guarantee your “girlfriend” is ugly as fuck than.

and also…

your an ugly red headed weird looking, goofy looking fuck with no friends who acts smart/tough over the internet.

item.title: Is this bull shit, or just me?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:46, topic:369210”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=465343.msg3403077#msg3403077 date=1290116715]

Hold on, lets make this a fair fight. Let me come to your house, kick you out of it, and make you go live in some shit ass hut in the middle of the desert, where the environment isn’t at all suitable for your former way of life.

Besides, I don’t know where you are getting your information from. Most Native American’s do not go to college for free. There are only scholarships and grants available to them, just like there are with everyone else.
Sauce: http://www.collegefund.org/content/quiz#q6

excuse me those indians aren’t alive still.

Excuse me, you’re still retarded. You obviously didn’t read the rest of what I was saying, which was that they don’t receive free college, except for one college in Colorado (iirc), and that is because the college gives them a free education, not the government.

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=465343.msg3403070#msg3403070 date=1290116463]

Hold on, lets make this a fair fight. Let me come to your house, kick you out of it, and make you go live in some shit ass hut in the middle of the desert, where the environment isn’t at all suitable for your former way of life.

Besides, I don’t know where you are getting your information from. Most Native American’s do not go to college for free. There are only scholarships and grants available to them, just like there are with everyone else.
Sauce: http://www.collegefund.org/content/quiz#q6
[/quote]the info came straight from my aunt. this was also 200 some years ago, so these indians, are not effected.

btw m.dog your a nerdy fuck, that will never get a girlfriend, go kill yourself.

Then your aunt is bullshitting out her ass. And why resort to useless, retarded comments? Because you know that you’re completely wrong? And how are these indians not affected? Don’t you think there lives have completely changed because they we’re pushed out of the areas they once lived? Please, think through things before you post them. Both of you are just making yourselves look retarded.
[/quote]the indians alive today are just as capable as the rest of us of making a decent life. and yes, they do give free college. im just stating what my aunt said.

btw m.dog you’re an ugly nerdy ginger headed fag that will never get a girlfriend.[/quote]
Like I said, either your aunt is bullshitting out her ass, or you are to cover yours. And btw, I have a girlfriend. What is that, 2 things I’ve proved you wrong on in this thread? So sit back, shut the fuck up, and jam it up your ass.

[quote=“Javafire, post:45, topic:369210”]so the indians deserve better treatment than the ones who found america and gave it a population. That sounds like racism to me. Rasism torwards white people can be possible, just look at certain gangs, they hate us “whities”.

I’m Jewish/German can i get money for being a walking contradiction?[/quote]
I don’t see how America was ever really found, when there have been people here (the Native Americans) since the ice age. I also don’t want to hear you complain about racism towards whites, as all you have done in this thread is be pigheaded and racist towards Native Americans.

Read full topic
item.source: Is this bull shit, or just me?
